DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate pharmacodynamics , safety , tolerability Fospropofol disodium dose produce maximal hypnotic effect define electroencephalogramderived assessment ( Bispectral Index [ BIS ] ) compare dynamic property PropofolF Propofol .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Efficacy Safety Fospropofol Disodium
DOC.detailed_description: After local ethic committee ( West China Hospital , Sichuan University , Chengdu , China ) approval write informed consent obtain , 80 healthy volunteer ( 40 male 40 female ) age 18 45 yr include . For 1 week study , subject follow diet limited amount alcohol caffeine . Ingestion caffeine , alcohol , product contain aspartame ( aspartame may increase formate concentration ) , use paracetamol within 24 h study drug administration result ineligibility . Exclusion criterion include hypersensitivity anesthetic ; know suspect serious disorder and/or significant dysfunction ; abnormal , clinically significant ECG finding ; participation investigational drug study within previous month ; know suspected pregnancy ; anatomical malformation expect produce difficult intubation know suspected history family history malignant hyperthermia .
